CastAway:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
CastAway:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

CastAway:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
CastAway:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
CastAway:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

CastAway:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
CastAway:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

CastAway:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
CastAway:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !CastAway:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

CastAway:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
CastAway:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !CastAway:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

CastAway:Throw.NAME: Throw
CastAway:Throw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard !M! cards. Deal !M! damage for each card discarded.

CastAway:InstantFeedback.NAME: Instant Feedback
CastAway:InstantFeedback.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage to a random enemy for each card you draw, except Turn Start.

CastAway:LostSouls.NAME: Lost Souls
CastAway:LostSouls.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each card in your discard pile that says Exhaust or Discard. Exhaust those cards.
